actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Human Resources (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-19.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Human Resources for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-19) Authorizes additional expenditures by the Committee on Human Resources for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1979, through February 29, 1980 in an amount not to exceed $2,753,000. Directs the Committee to report its findings and recommendations for legislation to the Senate not later than February 29, 1980.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Human Resources for inquiries and investigations.
